laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Illumigene DNA amplification assay. (Reference Range-Negative).

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: CT Abdomen and Pelvis with Contrast
laboratory_examinations.findings: Small multi lobulated rim enhancing fluid collection in the gallbladder fossa measuring approximately 3.9 x 1.3 cm. Small to moderate amount of inflammatory fat stranding in the vicinity.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Worsening atelectasis at the lung bases bilaterally.
